links.*: Proceedings of the J.R.R. Tolkien Centenary Conference

wikitext.*:
'''Patricia Reynolds''' has written and edited books and articles related to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. She is also the Archivist of [[the Tolkien Society]].<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.nationalarchives.gov.uk/archon/searches/locresult_details.asp?LR=2129|articlename=Tolkien Society Archives|dated=|website=[http://www.nationalarchives.gov.uk/ NationalArchives.gov.uk]|accessed=16 July 2012}}</ref>
